title: Lux Ultimate
body:
Should Lux's ultimate 'Final Spark'
have width indicators?

all other spalls that act in the same way (Xerath's Q, Taric's E, Jinx W etc) all have range/size indicators, while Lux's just has a small red line, and we all know how deceptively wide her ult is.

Why does Lux get special treatment?
shouldn't she have to conform as well? for clarity's sake?

replies.body: To be fair, the width indicators arent entirely accurate. for example, exeraths q actually extands slightly further than the indicator, and jhinns w is slightly wider then indicated too.
This is true, but Lux's ultimate is a LOT wider than the little red line.
